column4: See, this is why I'd love it if some channel management decided to split this channel into two or three branches. Sure, everyone can help everyone here, but look at the nicklist! It goes on forever. The 'help' flies by so fast that it's a miracle to behold if you actually get noticed.
that's why you use a person's nick when you talk to them so the line highlights
That doesn't help the getting-noticed-in-the-first-place part of it. :P

sure.. if you're helping then your attention goes to what is highlighted.. if you're receiving it's the same.. ignore the rest or take some adhd meds to speed up the mental process.. but that's not recommended
